Capability "CHOWN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/init-fs.allow-capability-chown: SomeReason'.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
